abstract: House approves bill with amendment that will lift lending cap for Small Business Admin loan guarantee program to record $23.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: A popular government-backed small-business lending program, suspended last week after reaching its limit for the year, is on the verge of restarting.

headline.main: House Approves Expansion of S.B.A. Loan Program
headline.print_headline: House Approves Expansion of S.B.A. Loan Program

snippet: A popular government-backed small-business lending program, suspended last week after reaching its limit for the year, is on the verge of restarting.
